"They will create an idol out of our fears!"
"Greetings sister. Have you come for the holy ceremony
"The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
"Greetings brother. Have you come for the holy ceremony
"The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
"Is there something you would like to know?"
"Tell me which god do you serve?"
"Where there is creation, there must be destruction. Such
"Common folk often portray Gro-goroth as a being of evil
or entity that must be avoided by all costs."
"Sylvian, the goddess... She once loved us so..."
"That is when lust, sex and addiction take a form of
"Alll-Mer is the most recent of all the older gods."
"But that is only because he made himself apparent at such
"He has existed for aeons as a seed of his father."
"Yes, there are countless older gods less known in these
"God of the Depths has an especially strong influence in
"The older gods have left this earth for us to suffer.
There are but traces of them left anymore."
"We don't know if it's a trial for the mankind, but they
left us in ruin, in what feels almost as out of spite."
"The new gods are for common men and women. They ascended to
power to bring an end to the era of darkness."
"The new gods offer new values. Values of greed, lust for
power, inhibition of sex and desperate seek for new
"They are the saviours of our time."
"Hm. So it is so - there is not room for all of us,

GabText You hear footsteps closing in!
"No wait. You're a sane one, right? Right!?"
"Yeah, of course. I'd be dead otherwise now."
"Listen - I've been lost in these dungeons for
"My sense of time has become blurry. It might be years,
months or, I fear, even just weeks."
"I just cannot handle it any longer. I-I feel
my mind giving up already! I just can't-!"
"I don't know what business you got here, but if I were
you, I'd run out as fast as possible! If escaping the place
is even possible anymore that is."

the horrors of these dungeons have had their way with you."
